subject: AI & Agents
title: Diffusion Models and AI Art
description: Learn Diffusion Models and AI Art in one minute.

hook.text: Type 'astronaut riding a horse on Mars, oil painting' and watch an AI create it in seconds.

buildup.text: Diffusion models learn by destroying images with noise, then learning to reverse the process.

discovery.text: DALL-E, Midjourney, and Stable Diffusion turned text into images with stunning quality.

twist.text: Artists discovered their work was used to train models without consent. Lawsuits followed.

climax.text: AI art won competitions, sparked copyright battles, and redefined what 'creation' means.

quiz.question: How do diffusion models generate images?
options: By learning to reverse a noise-adding process
By converting text to pixels one at a time
